articles.description: England defence of the T20 World Cup is over after they slump to a 68-run thrashing by a superb India in the semi-final in Guyana.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: England thrashed by India in Guyana semi-final

articles.description: England defender Ezri Konsa says the families of players were hit by beer cups after their goalless draw with Slovenia.
articles.title: England families 'hit' by beer cups 'from all angles' after Euro 2024 draw with Slovenia

articles.description: Antonin Panenka's penalty in the Euro 1976 final birthed a whole new 12-yard tactic. But the risks were higher than anyone could imagine.
articles.title: Antonin Panenka: The Euro 1976 penalty that killed a career and birthed a feud

articles.description: British swimmer Archie Goodburn reveals he has been diagnosed with inoperable brain tumours.
articles.title: British swimmer Archie Goodburn diagnosed with brain tumours

articles.description: Bronny James is picked by the Los Angeles Lakers in the second round of the NBA draft bringing his father LeBron's dream of playing alongside his son a step closer.
articles.title: Bronny James: LA Lakers draft LeBron James' son in second round

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris says he is searching for perfection in his quest to beat Red Bull’s Max Verstappen consistently in Formula 1.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix 2024: McLaren's Lando Norris searching for perfection in quest to beat Red Bull's Max Verstappen

articles.description: England attacking midfielder Phil Foden will return to Germany on Thursday after travelling to the United Kingdom for the birth of his third child.
articles.title: Phil Foden: England midfielder to return to Euro 2024 camp after birth of child

articles.description: Britain’s Emma Raducanu, Katie Boulter and Harriet Dart are all beaten in the quarter-finals at Eastbourne.
articles.title: Eastbourne International: Britain’s Emma Raducanu, Katie Boulter & Harriet Dart beaten

articles.description: England's Marc Guehi says manager Gareth Southgate has the full support of the entire squad as they prepare for the knockout stages of Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Marc Guehi praises England manager Gareth Southgate

articles.description: A former prime minister of Georgia says he will give £8.4m to Willy Sagnol's players after their Euro 2024 win against Portugal.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Former Georgia prime minister pledges £8.4m to players after Portugal win
